^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ThermalControl.description: This property shall enable or disable Thermal/Automatic control of eRDHx.
ThermalControl.longDescription: This property when set to 'Off' will disable Thermal/Automatic controls of eRDHx. Some devices like Valves and Fans will turn off and controls will be handed over to the user.

enumDescriptions.Off: Withdraw control from Thermal to enable user controls.

title: #DellThermalSubsystem.v1_0_0
